country.text: Database environment not bootstrapped, please do so with ENV::bootstrap(ENV::DATABASE);
The algorithm "@algo@" is not supported, please make sure its one of these: "@algoList@"
The field "@fieldName@" for model "@model@" is of wrong value type.
The field "@fieldName@" for model "@model@" is of wrong type, must be int,float,string or null.
The field "@fieldName@" for model "@model@" has a greater length than specified in the model.
The field "@fieldName@" for model "@model@" does not support null value.
The field "@fieldName@" for model "@model@" is defined as readonly by the model, hence you cannot modify it.
Invalid database name "@name@". Forgot your config/dbs/default.xml?
Invalid field name "@fieldName@" for model "@model@".
Invalid result resource type, expected "@expected@" but got "@actual@".
Invalid connection type, expected "@expected@" but got "@actual@".
The query "@query@" failed to execute properly, see error: @error@
The connection information for the database @name@ of the type @dbType@ with the access "@accessType@" could not be found.
The database access type "@accessType@" is not valid.
The database config "@filename@" is invalid, some information are missing.
The type "@type@" is not supported at this time.
There is already an entry with value "@value@" for key "@key@" in `@database@`.@table@.
The model must have 1 primary key only in order to work properly with status.
The model must have 1 primary key atleast to work properly.
The model has no statuses
The model "@modelName@" requires the phpdoc "@@phpdoc@" to work properly.
The file "@filename@" is not writable!
The folder "@foldername@" is not writable!
The text file "@filename@" could not be found in: @paths@
The text id "@id@" was not found. Available IDs are: @availableIds@
The bootstrap type "@type@" is unsupported at this time.
Unknown environment name "@mpf_env@", make sure it exists in your ini files
The Config "@config1@" overlaps with another config.
Unknown environment type "@type@".
Invalid request method "@method@"
Invalid request action "@action@"
The request is missing the following fields: "@fields@"
There is already an account with the username "@username@"
Your account has not been approved yet
Invalid credentials
User (#@id@) @username@ successfully logged in
Could not parse json, returned error: @errorNumber@
